text: Lister watches the tide of starlight. "Three shards drift inside the Palace of Fear. Bring them back, and the dream remembers hope."

choices.label: I'm ready to step inside the palace.
Tell me more about the shards.

text: "Each shard is a forgotten courage. Hold them close, and the Avatar's mask cracks. Even the companions hear the song."
"If you trust them, they answer in harmony. A synchronized skill waits for the brave."
Lister traces sigils in the tide. "I can hear at least one shard in your voice. When all three glow, the Avatar will falter."

choices.label: All three shards answer each other.

text: "The first shard softens the Avatar's glare. It will lose one of its masks when you face it."
"With two shards, Fear hesitates. It can no longer shield itself behind ice."
"All three? Then the Avatar's opening blow will falter. I'll weave a protective echo when you face it."
"Follow the ribbon of moonlight. When you return, bring a story."
